column2: "I'm really looking forward to your findings. I have a hunch that severe thunderstorms are quite frequent down there."
"Maybe it's because it didn't continue for long, but it looks like there aren't any solid observation records for ARKS."
"Oh, I almost forgot to ask your name!"
"<%me>? Thanks! It's a pleasure to meet you!"
"I'll be monitoring your progress from right here, <%me>!"
